title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 02 August 2009 - XWiki
content:

vmassol joined #xwiki at 15:20  
vmassol\_ joined #xwiki at 15:29  
vmassol left at 15:48 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
venkatesh joined #xwiki at 16:16  
cristinas joined #xwiki at 16:23  
arunreddy joined #xwiki at 16:46  
arunreddy\_ joined #xwiki at 16:52  
trifon joined #xwiki at 17:01  
arunreddy left at 17:01 (Read error: 60 (Operation timed out))  
anamarias left at 17:08 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer))  
cristinas left at 17:46 ("Leaving")  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 18:30): vmassol\_ : HI  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:31): arunreddy\_: hi  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 18:31): Am trying to change the exisiting implementation.  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 18:32): But before that i would like to know the importer from user perspective.   
A-Kaser left at 18:33 (""Soyons réalistes, exigeons l'impossible." Ché Guevara")  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 18:34): As the user will upload the Dump from his server machine. How to handle the configuration properties  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 18:34): Would it be better Wizard way. or user uploadiing a configuration file. ?  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 18:36): vmassol\_: Am i understandable ?  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:37): arunreddy\_: we need an import UI (if that's the question)  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 18:38): Yes. we need one. But am not clear on what all to include in UI.  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 18:39): Config Properties like.. Metadata, Attachements, History and so on.   
anamarias joined #xwiki at 18:40  
anamarias\_ joined #xwiki at 18:49  
anamarias left at 18:49 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer))  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:51): arunreddy\_: not sure what you're asking. Maybe you could make a proposal on the mailing list?  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:52): then we can discuss it there  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 18:52): Ok   
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:52): you could start by listing all ropeties  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:52): properties  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:52): (at least the ones you already know ofà  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:52): s/à/)/  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:53): arunreddy\_: have you seen my comments following my code review?  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 18:54): Yes. Am working on those. 1) Removing Wiki Interface  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 18:54): 2) Wiki Importer Configuration Component.  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:54): re the dump to import, I think we should leave it to the user to put it on the server for now  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:54): ok cool  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 18:55): And i have created a Jira Issue on sand box.  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:55): ok   
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:55): (haven't seen it)  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 18:56): http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XSANDBOX/component/10800  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:56): arunreddy\_: hmmmm  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:57): i don't see any issue for implementing a Wiki Importer  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:57): but you have 2 issues regarding improving something that doesn't exist (since there's no issue for it) ;)  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:57): you should not have jira issues for stuff that "don't exist"  
anamarias\_ left at 18:57 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer))  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:58): don't exist = not released  
anamarias joined #xwiki at 18:58  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:58): if you need help re jira there are guidelines here:  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:58): http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DevelopmentPractices  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 18:58): Can i make some release.   
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 18:59): Suppose if i want to create one for Wiki Importer Configuration Component .. Can i create a issue for it.  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 18:59): a release for a component?  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:00): a releaase should be made for something that can be tested end to end  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:00): you can create a jira issue for a first version of the importer and then have subtask for that first version and when you have implemented them you can send an email asking for review  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:00): you should do that as much as possible  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:00): right now noboyd really now what works in your work and what's left to be done  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:01): s/now/know/  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:01): we talked about it internally and noboyd was able to tell the status  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:01): this is not good  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:01): you really need to have working stuff end to end and show it + communicate on the list/explain how to use it, etc  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 19:03): Ok.I never knew that.  
guillaum1 left at 19:03 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
guillaum1 joined #xwiki at 19:04  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:05): otp  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:13): back  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:14): yes at this stage it's important to have something working even if it doesn't do everything  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:14): but at least something working end to end  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:14): that you can then work on improving step by step  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:15): you should also communicate more on the list and less on irc, irc is very bad in that only those present can talk and the others don't interact  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:15): for ex I'm giving you only my POV right now but the others can't do the same since they're not online....  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:15): (arunreddy\_ )  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:15): :)  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 19:16): yeah. Actually i had mediawiki and confluence simple import working end to end  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:16): that's great!  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:17): you need to show it to others  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:17): explain you have it working  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 19:17): But as per your feed back i need to make changes in implementation.  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:17): explain how we can reproduce it  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:17): you can show it while you make improvements  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:17): you need feedback from others  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:18): this really the open source way of working  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:18): you start small, you show, you get feedback, you improve, you show, you get feedback, etc  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:19): basically this is how we write software collaboratively  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 19:19): Ok. I will do that. Can i make a release with the exisiting implementation . ?  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:20): you can tag in the sandbox but not do a real release  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:20): you can install stuff on incubator though if you need to show something  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 19:20): release mean - some thing working that i can show to others.  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:20): you can also install on your machine  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:20): and give access  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:20): you can also give instructions to install  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 19:21): I would like to install it on incubator. I dont have continous net access.  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:21): by taking the tagged sources and explain how to build them and deploy them  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:21): re incubator, fine, just send an email explaninig what needs to be done  
anamarias - (02/08/2009 19:22): hi vmassol\_ : what do you mean by tagged sources ?  
arunreddy\_ - (02/08/2009 19:22): 2 things. Import a XAR file and a component jar in Xwiki Lib  
vmassol\_ - (02/08/2009 19:22): svn move
